sentences.sentence: All of these patients were hospitalized because of severe haematological disorders.
sentences.translation: 所有这些患者均因严重的血液病而入院治疗。

sentences.sentence: Objective: to discuss the clinical and haematological characteristics of sea-blue histiocytic syndrome (SBH).
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨海蓝组织细胞综合征(SBH)的临床及血液学特点。

sentences.sentence: Results: 80 % of the patients reached the haematological alleviation, 32 % of the patients occurred cytogenetical reaction.
sentences.translation: 结果：80 %患者达到血液学缓解，32 %患者产生细胞遗传学反应。
